mapper.insert: insert into customer (name, weChat, QQ, tel, age, gender, email, province, diplomas, major, school, graduateTime, workSeniority, inputUser_id, salesman_id, inputTime, source, collegeClient, clientType, intentionCampus, intentionSubject, intentionClass, intentionExtent, state, computer, nextFollowDate, concern, remark) values (#{name}, #{weChat}, #{QQ}, #{tel}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{province}, #{diplomas}, #{major}, #{school}, #{graduateTime}, #{workSeniority}, #{inputUser_id}, #{salesman_id}, #{inputTime}, #{source}, #{collegeClient}, #{clientType}, #{intentionCampus}, #{intentionSubject}, #{intentionClass}, #{intentionExtent}, #{state}, #{computer}, #{nextFollowDate}, #{concern}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update customer set name = #{name}, weChat = #{weChat}, QQ = #{QQ}, tel = #{tel}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, province = #{province}, diplomas = #{diplomas}, major = #{major}, school = #{school}, graduateTime = #{graduateTime}, workSeniority = #{workSeniority}, inputUser_id = #{inputUser_id}, salesman_id = #{salesman_id}, inputTime = #{inputTime}, source = #{source}, collegeClient = #{collegeClient}, clientType = #{clientType}, intentionCampus = #{intentionCampus}, intentionSubject = #{intentionSubject}, intentionClass = #{intentionClass}, intentionExtent = #{intentionExtent}, state = #{state}, computer = #{computer}, nextFollowDate = #{nextFollowDate}, concern = #{concern}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, weChat, QQ, tel, age, gender, email, province, diplomas, major, school, graduateTime, workSeniority, inputUser_id, salesman_id, inputTime, source, collegeClient, clientType, intentionCampus, intentionSubject, intentionClass, intentionExtent, state, computer, nextFollowDate, concern, remark from customer where id = #{id}

select id, name, weChat, QQ, tel, age, gender, email, province, diplomas, major, school, graduateTime, workSeniority, inputUser_id, salesman_id, inputTime, source, collegeClient, clientType, intentionCampus, intentionSubject, intentionClass, intentionExtent, state, computer, nextFollowDate, concern, remark from customer
